heroTitle1: Lost something? Find it with us.
heroSubtitle: Our platform connects you with a community of finders and businesses to help you reunite with your lost belongings.
feature1Desc: Quickly search our database for lost items in your area.
feature2Desc: Submit a detailed report of your lost or found item in minutes.
feature3Desc: We partner with airports, malls, and transport services to expand our reach.
benefit1: Centralized database for all lost & found items.
benefit2: Smart matching algorithms to connect you faster.
benefit3: Secure messaging to protect your privacy.
successQuote: I lost my favorite headphones at the airport. Thanks to FindItNow, the staff contacted me within hours and I got them back the next day!
downloadSubtitle: Find what you've lost, right from your pocket.
faqLink1: How do I report a lost item?
faqLink2: What happens after I report a found item?
faqLink4: How do I claim an item?
testimonialsSubtitle: Stories of successful reunions from our community.
footerReuniting: Reuniting people with their valued possessions.
aboutSubtitle: We believe that what is lost can be found. Our mission is to provide the most effective platform for reuniting people with their lost items.
aboutMissionDesc: To create a global network of finders and owners, powered by smart technology and community spirit, making the process of recovering lost items simple, secure, and successful.
aboutValues1Desc: We operate with honesty and transparency in all our interactions.
aboutValues2Desc: We foster a supportive community of helpers and owners.
aboutValues3Desc: We constantly improve our technology to make finding easier.
aboutJoinDesc: Become a part of our growing community. Report a found item, help someone in need, or partner with us.
servicesSubtitle: Tailored solutions for individuals and businesses.
servicesIndividualDesc: A free and easy way to find your lost items.
servicesIndividualFeat1: Free lost and found item reporting.
servicesIndividualFeat4: A vast network of public and private partners.
servicesBusinessDesc: Streamline your lost and found process.
servicesBusinessFeat1: A dedicated dashboard to manage items.
servicesReadyDesc: Whether you've lost an item or want to help, we're here for you.
hiwSubtitle: A simple, 4-step process to reunite you with your belongings.
hiwStep1Desc: Use our detailed forms to report a lost or found item, or browse existing listings.
hiwStep2Desc: Our AI-powered system works behind the scenes to find potential matches for your item.
hiwStep3Desc: Receive instant alerts via email when a potential match is found for your item.
hiwStep4Desc: Use our secure chat to communicate with the finder/owner and arrange for a safe return.
faq1Title: How do I report a lost item?
faq1Content: Simply click on the 'I Lost Something' button on our homepage. You'll be guided through a form to provide details about the item, where you lost it, and how you can be contacted. The more detail, the better!
faq2Title: What information should I include in my report?
faq2Content: Be as specific as possible. Include the item's brand, color, size, any distinguishing marks, and the last known location. For found items, describe it accurately but consider holding back one unique detail so the owner can use it as proof.
faq3Title: Is it free to use FindItNow?
faq3Content: Yes, for individuals, reporting and searching for items is completely free. We also offer premium services for businesses and organizations to manage their lost and found processes.
faq4Title: How do you protect my privacy?
faq4Content: We prioritize your security. Communication between finders and owners happens through our anonymous chat system. Your personal contact information is only shared when you decide to do so.
faq5Title: What if someone falsely claims my found item?
faq5Content: We recommend you ask the claimant for a specific detail about the item that was not included in the public listing. This helps verify true ownership before you arrange a return.
faq6Title: I'm a business. How can FindItNow help me?
faq6Content: Our partner program provides businesses like hotels, airports, and malls with a dashboard to manage all found items efficiently. This improves customer service and reduces the time your staff spends on lost and found inquiries. Visit our 'For Business' page to learn more.
partnerLoginSubtitle: Access your business dashboard to manage found items.
partnerRegisterSubtitle: Join our network to streamline your lost & found and help more people.
partnerDashboardSubtitle: Welcome to your central hub for managing found items.
partnerItemsTotal: Total items you've logged in the system.
partnerRecentItemsDesc: Here are the latest items you've reported.
partnerEnquiriesSubtitle: Review and respond to claims for items you've reported.
partnerEnquiriesNoEnquiriesDesc: When someone makes a claim on an item you've found, it will appear here.
reportFormLostDesc: Provide as much detail as possible to help us find your item.
reportFormFoundDesc: Thank you for helping someone today. Please describe the item you found.
reportFormEditDesc: Update the details of your reported item below.
reportFormDescPlaceholder: e.g., Bifold wallet with a small scratch on the corner. Contains credit cards and a driver's license.
reportFormLocationPlaceholder: e.g., Central Park, near the main fountain
reportFormContactEmailDescNew: This email will be used to log in and receive notifications. We will send a verification code.
reportFormContactEmailDescAuth: You are logged in. This will be the contact email for this item.
reportFormImageDescNew: The first image will be the main one. Add up to 4 more for details.
reportFormImageDescExisting: Add or replace images for your item.

browseNoItemsDesc: No items were found matching your criteria. Try expanding your search.
browseItemNotFoundDesc: The item you are looking for might have been removed or the link is incorrect.
itemResolvedDesc: This item has been successfully resolved and is on its way back to its owner.
isThisYourItemDesc: If you believe this item belongs to you, please file a claim to start the verification process with the finder.
cannotClaimOwnItem: You cannot claim an item you reported.
haveYouFoundThisDesc: If you've found this item, please send a message to the owner to start the return process. Provide details about where and when you found it.
foundFormLocationFoundPlaceholder: e.g., On a bench at Grand Central
claimFormProofPlaceholder: Describe something unique about the item that only the owner would know. e.g., 'The scratch on the back is near the top left corner' or 'The lock screen of the phone is a picture of a cat.'
claimFormProofImageDesc: Have a photo of you with the item? Upload it here.
toastClaimSubmittedDesc: Your claim has been sent to the item's finder. You will be notified when they respond.
validation.nameRequired: Name must be at least 2 characters.
validation.proofMin: Proof must be at least 20 characters.
validation.itemNameMin: Item name must be at least 3 characters.
validation.descriptionMin: Description must be at least 10 characters.
validation.locationMin: Location must be at least 3 characters.
validation.imageRequired: At least one image is required.
validation.passwordMin: Password must be at least 6 characters.
validation.subjectMin: Subject must be at least 5 characters.
validation.messageMin: Message must be at least 10 characters.
validation.messageMax: Message must not be longer than 1000 characters.
validation.storyMin: Please share a brief story of at least 10 characters.

contactSubtitle: Have questions or need support? We're here to help.
contactFormDesc: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

contactInfoDesc: For direct inquiries, you can reach us here.

privacyIntroContent: This Privacy Policy describes how FindItNow ('we', 'us', or 'our') collects, uses, and discloses your information when you use our services. We are committed to protecting your privacy and handling your data in an open and transparent manner.
privacyInfoCollectContent1: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, report a lost or found item, or communicate with other users. This may include your name, email address, phone number, and details about the item.
privacyInfoCollectContent2: We also collect some information automatically, such as your IP address, device type, and how you interact with our service. This helps us improve our platform and keep it secure.
privacyInfoUseContent: We use the information we collect to operate, maintain, and improve our services; to communicate with you, including sending you service-related notifications; to facilitate communication between users; and to protect the security and integrity of our platform.
privacyInfoShareContent: We do not sell your personal data. We may share information with other users as necessary to facilitate the return of a lost item (e.g., your name and the item description are public). We will not share your contact details like email or phone number without your consent, which is implicitly given when you initiate a chat or claim.
privacyInfoKeepContent: We retain your personal information for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide you with our services. We may also retain information to comply with legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our agreements.
privacyInfoSafeContent: We implement security measures designed to protect your information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no internet-based site can be 100% secure, so we cannot guarantee absolute security.
privacyMinorsContent: Our service is not intended for individuals under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If we become aware that a child under 13 has provided us with personal information, we will take steps to delete such information.
privacyRightsContent: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You can manage your information through your account settings or by contacting us directly for assistance.
termsAgreementContent: By using our service, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use the service.
termsServiceDescContent: FindItNow provides a platform for users to report and search for lost and found items. We act as a facilitator to connect owners and finders and are not involved in the actual exchange of items. We do not guarantee the return of any item.
termsUserConductContent: You agree not to use the service to post any false, misleading, or fraudulent information. You are solely responsible for your interactions with other users. We encourage you to use caution and good judgment.
termsDisclaimersContent: The service is provided on an 'as is' and 'as available' basis. FindItNow disclaims all warranties of any kind, whether express or implied, including, but not limited to, the implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, and non-infringement.
termsLiabilityContent: In no event shall FindItNow be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or exemplary damages, including but not limited to, damages for loss of property, goodwill, use, data, or other intangible losses.
termsGoverningLawContent: These Terms shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction in which our company is based, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
suspendedDesc: Your account has been temporarily suspended due to a violation of our terms of service.
suspendedReason: If you believe this is a mistake, please contact our support team to appeal this decision.
toastAccountSuspendedDesc: Please contact support for more information.
